news.title: ‘This has retraumatised me’ – Nikita Hand says as Conor McGregor loses appeal in civil rape case
news.summary: Nikita Hand said she may now finally “try to heal” after Conor McGregor lost his challenge against a High Court jury's finding that he raped her in a Dublin penthouse.

news.title: Private Seán Rooney’s mother criticises Simon Harris for his comments after Lebanon murder trial: ‘Speak to me...before seeking to speak for me’
news.summary: The mother of Private Seán Rooney has hit out at Tánaiste Simon Harris over comments he made after a Lebanese court convicted several men for offences related to her son’s murder.

news.title: Man (23) charged over stabbing of garda in Dublin city centre
news.summary: A 23-year-old man charged over the stabbing of a garda on a Dublin city centre street on Tuesday evening has been remanded in custody.

news.title: US actor jailed for five years for raping and choking Brazilian woman in Dublin
news.summary: A US actor who raped a teenager in his Dublin Airbnb and choked her until she passed out has been jailed for five years.

news.title: John Meagher: Seán Rocks was a family man and a champion of the arts, and broadcasting will not be the same without him
news.summary: Last Friday night, at a radio studio in RTÉ’s Stage 7 building, Seán Rocks signed off from  Arena  for the last time. He wasn’t to know it, of course.

news.title: ‘Wake up call’ – some gardai have shown ‘blatant disregard’ for roads policing duties, report reveals
news.summary: Some gardai have shown a “blatant disregard” for roads policing duties, according to a “sobering” unpublished report.

news.title: Mary McCarthy: We want all the gory details, but Pat and Cat’s break-up is made all the more raw by their fame
news.summary: Marriage break-ups are sad and lonely. But when an apparently happy celebrity couple such as Patrick Kielty and Cat Deeley suddenly announce their union has burned to the ground, the pain will be magnified by the harsh exposing nature of fame.

news.title: Meet the step-parenting coach: ‘Let go of the idea of becoming an ‘instant family’ as that expectation is a fast track to resentment’
news.summary: Becoming a parent is never easy, but the situation becomes a whole lot more complicated when someone else’s children are involved. Although it’s difficult to ascertain how many step-parents there are in Ireland, it is estimated that roughly 2.5pc of Irish children live with step-families.

news.title: Rhasidat Adeleke explains her decision to withdraw from National Track and Field Championships in Santry
news.summary: Rhasidat Adeleke will miss this weekend’s 123.ie National Track and Field Championships in Santry as she focuses on overcoming physical issues that have been affecting her this season.

news.title: Day four of Galway Races 2025: Outfits inspired by Dior and All-Ireland hurling champions Tipperary win prestigious Ladies Day competition
news.summary: The weather did not disappoint at the Galway Races on Thursday and neither did the outfits, but only two were crowned on the famous Ladies Day stage – one inspired by Dior and one by County Tipperary.
